channel.title: children on Vishal Rajpal
channel.description: Recent content in children on Vishal Rajpal

item.title: Nevish's Blog 2: Another day of sticking things together
item.description: Day 2 Note for missing two days - Daddy hurt his eye while playing badminton with his friends. Hence, we couldn’t blog. We had school today morning and we learnt the alphabets - ‘H’ and ‘I’. We also had a story time in the school’s session and we read a story about a cap-seller and a monkey. We had story time with Dipna too (later in the day) and we learnt about snorkelling and sea creatures - eel, snakes and yellow fishes.

item.title: Nevish's blog 1: The start
item.description: Day 1 We are beginning our daily experiment to log our activities and learnings for the day together (Nevish, mommy and Daddy) Nevish: I had (virtual) school this morning at 11 am. The class was moved to MS Teams platform today and it was a little noisy. Possibly, it was the transition but it wasn’t as smooth as zoom. However, we started the class with praying and then we learnt answering questions like “What is my Name?
